pullRequest.title: Add 'Generate constructor' option to 'Show Fixes' options for fields
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes redhat-developer/vscode-java#1358
Signed-off-by: Snjezana Peco snjezana.peco@redhat.com

nodes.bodyText: we're basically recomputing the actions a 2nd time, seems suboptimal. Couldn't we just copy the ones we have already and change their kind?
